channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1686; 11:44PM; 10936 W Otsego St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZlfyzU; #NorthHollywood; It took 31 firefighters 22 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish flames in the living space and attic of an abandoned one-story single-family home. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E289 E76 E86 EM14 RA102 RA76 RA860 T60 T89; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1686; 11:22PM; 10936 W Otsego St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZlfyzU; #NorthHollywood; One-story vacant home with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E289 E76 E86 EM14 RA102 RA76 RA860 T60 T89; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

Automobile Fire; INC#1562; 09:42PM; 6000 S Gramercy Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FPeXzN; #ChesterfieldSquare; LAFD is responding to reports of a rubbish/auto (possible RV) fire in the street following several minutes of fireworks explosions in the intersection. No reported injuries. Engine 66 will handle. Nothing further.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E66; CH7; Nicholas Prange

Debris Flow, Small; INC#1404; 07:50PM; 949 N Las Lomas Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lI8y2m; #PacificPalisades; Approximately 100' x 200' area of hillside sloughed off and made contact with one home on the downhill side, where one family of 8 will be displaced (4 adults and 4 children will stay with loved ones, no need for Red Cross response). One elderly male evacuated from the home above the impacted hillside was evacuated as a precaution. A "Slough Off" is soil sliding, but only a loosing of the uppermost layers. There are no injuries or medical complaints. Firefighters secured all utilities, requested Department of Building and Safety respond to assess the integrity of the structure, and are denying entry to the area for public safety. A grading inspector and geologist will be responding in the morning to assess the situation in daylight.; FS 69; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E269 E69 T69 UR88; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0894; 01:51PM; 2098 N Fuller Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/40BorXd; #HollywoodHillsWest; Firefighters located an approximately 35-year-old female with an ankle injury in a remote hiking area of Runyon Canyon, unable to continue on. LAFD Air Ops lowered a Paramedic rescuer down to her for evaluation and preparation for hoist. LAFD Fire 3 hoisted the patient and transported her to a local hospital for further care. Nothing further.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 BC5 E227 E27 E41 H3 HA3 RA41 RA827 RH114 T27; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 03/26/2023 INC#0059

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0059; 01:09AM; 8936 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TMs22t; #GramercyPark; *Address and Community Name Corrected* First Arriving 36 LAFD Firefighters of the Greater Alarm assignment took just 20 minutes in largely defensive operations to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire in a vacant and boarded one-story commercial strip mall, the site of a previous fire. A two-story residential duplex to the south was skillfully protected from harm. No injuries reported. The fire cause is under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E203 E233 E264 E266 E294 E33 E34 E5 E57 E66 EM13 HR3 RA257 RA857 RA866 T3 T33 T64 T66 T94 UR3 UR88; CH7; 14 16; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0059; 12:49AM; 8424 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/40zTUZL; #ManchesterSquare; PRELIM: Defensive firefighting operations against heavy fire in a vacant and boarded one-story strip mall, the site of a previous fire, with flames threatening a two-story residential duplex to the south. ; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E203 E233 E264 E266 E294 E33 E34 E5 E57 E66 EM13 HR3 RA257 RA857 RA866 T3 T33 T64 T66 T94 UR3 UR88; CH9; 14 16; Brian Humphrey

Confined Space Rescue; INC#1245; 06:09PM; 18900 W Knapp St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nnQCuv; #Northridge; Homeowner stated 50 year-old male plumber entered crawlspace in (3 foot maximimum) raised foundation beneath their 2,100 square foot one-story home (built 1958), as many as three hours prior, and was not seen or heard from since, and not responsive to homeowner shouts or noise. LAFD crews, including those specially trained and equipped in Urban Search & Rescue arrived quickly to ventilate and monitor the enclosed environment, and soon visibly noted a small portion of the still unresponsive worker's body at a distance. Firefighters cutting the second of two holes in the home's floor with chainsaws to gain best access, and to assist in his efficient removal, awakened the sleeping worker, who soon thereafter crawled from beneath the home uninjured. LAFD crews are now medically evaluating the plumber, who does not appear in need of ambulance transportation.; FS 70; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 BC14 BC15 E103 E273 E288 E289 E70 E88 EM15 HR3 RA104 RA87 RA889 RA89 T73 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1214; 06:15PM; 3571 N Berry Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3z3EnWF; #StudioCity; 34 Firefighters took just 32 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish stubborn flames within a two story garage attached to a one-story home. One adult female civilian (unknown age / gender / condition/ site affiliation / circumstances) has been transported to an area hospital for a yet to be determined medical need. No other injuries reported. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E260 E278 E60 E86 RA60 RA97 T60 T78; CH9; 18; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1214; 05:43PM; 3571 N Berry Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3z3EnWF; #StudioCity; PRELIM: Fire in a two story garage (attached to?) a one-story home. One adult female civilian currently being evaluated at scene for undetermined medical needs.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E260 E278 E60 E86 RA97 T60 T78; CH9; 18; Brian Humphrey
